sources.title: Automatic Data Processing Reports Hack Attack - HuffPost
sources.snippet: Automatic Data Processing (ADP), a major payroll processor, announced on Wednesday that data belonging to one of its clients was potentially compromised in a recent hack. In a press release, ADP said it was investigating the breach, which occurred at the company's recently-acquired benefits administration provider, Workscape.

sources.title: MAJEWSKI v. AUTOMATIC DATA PROCESSING INC (2001) | FindLaw
